I am currently an Assistant Teaching Professor at the University of Minnesota teaching gradate level introductory statistics courses in the Educational Psychology department. I also oversee an undergraduate course focused on visualization. My research interests focus on statistics and data science education, particularly in relation to coding and data visualization.
